description: International law proscribes the use of force except in self-defence - but what constitutes self-defence?

title: Pacers vs Thunder: Indiana defeats OKC in Game 6 of the NBA Finals
description: Indiana Pacers dominate Oklahoma City Thunder to push NBA Finals to a decisive Game 7 for the first time in nine years.

title: Israel-Iran live updates: Israel strikes 3rd hospital in Iran
description: The U.S. did not provide any military assistance or have any involvement in Israel's Friday strike, a U.S. official told ABC News.

title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

title: Alleged trespasser at Memphis mayor's home charged with attempted kidnapping
description: The suspect was apprehended and charged after police investigated "suspicious activity" in Mayor Paul Young's neighborhood, the Memphis Police Department said Wednesday.

title: Singer Chris Brown pleads not guilty to London nightclub assault
description: Singer Chris Brown has pleaded not guilty in London after being charged in a serious assault at a London nightclub two years ago.

title: WATCH:  ‘I’m pretty lucky’: Teen struck by lightning as thunderstorms hit Northeast
description: In New York City, a teenager was struck by lightning in Central Park Thursday afternoon, police said. The boy is alert and conscious, police said.

description: Cyrus rose up onto the Stade de France stage to perform the Grammy-winning duet “2 Most Wanted” with Beyoncé on Thursday night

description: Kaci Wilson’s son, Myles Godfrey, died from brain injuries sustained in a car accident. His organs saved the lives of multiple children, including 7-year-old Saleh Ahmad.

title: WATCH:  Congressman nearly ‘run off road’ raises political violence concerns
description: Rep. Max Miller, R-Ohio, said he was "run off the road" by a driver with a Palestinian flag, amid a disturbing increase in political violence nationwide.

title: WATCH:  Terrifying moment silverback gorilla charges toward trekkers in Uganda
description: "This was a rare occurrence and no one, gorilla or human, got hurt," the wildlife conservationist who shot the video said.

title: White House says Iran could produce a nuclear weapon in 'a couple of weeks'

description: A U.S. attack on Iran's key underground nuclear facility would not be a guaranteed success, according to a national security expert.

title: Trump vowed to be a 'peacemaker' but foreign conflicts only ramping up on his watch
description: President Trump said he wanted his legacy to be that of a "peacemaker and a unifier." Six months into his term, conflicts are raging on three fronts.

title: Authorities investigating pizzas anonymously sent to lawmakers: Sources
description: Anonymous pizza deliveries have lawmakers worried and are stoking fears of potential attacks, sources tell ABC News.

description: A proposal by Senate Republicans would adjust the pace at which some crucial home energy efficiency and electric vehicle tax credits are phased out in timelines different from what House Republicans proposed in the multitrillion-dollar tax bill they pa...

description: Iranian state television has urged people to remove WhatsApp from their smart phones, alleging without specific evidence that the messaging app gathered user information to send to Israel

description: Mount Lewotobi Laki Laki volcano in south-central Indonesia has erupted, spewing towering columns of hot ash

description: Four uncrewed robotic sailboats known as “Voyagers” have been put into service by the Danish Armed Forces for a three-month trial

description: WhatsApp says that users will start seeing ads in some parts of the app, as owner Meta Platforms moves to a cultivate a new revenue stream by tapping the billions of people that use the messaging service
